name: Military School
description: The Military School can be assigned to produce one type of unit continuously at no cost, however they are produced at a slower rate.

variations.name: Military School
variations.description: The Military School can be assigned to produce one type of unit continuously at no cost, however they are produced at a slower rate.
influences: Military unit production rate increased +20%/+30%/+40% by Age while within the influence of a Blacksmith or University. The Istanbul Observatory increases the bonus to +100%.
